meanings.sent1: The mouse squeezed through the chut in the wall.
meanings.sent2: The key got stuck in the chut of the lock.
meanings.sent3: I dropped my ring down the chut between the floorboards!
meanings.sent4: The chut of light coming through the curtains illuminated the room.
meanings.sent5: The explorer crawled through the dark chut to reach the hidden chamber.

meanings.sent1: The sudden chut of the door closing startled me.
meanings.sent2: The chut of the drum signaled the start of the performance.
meanings.sent3: The chut of the balloon popping made everyone jump.
meanings.sent4: The chut of the whip echoed through the arena.
meanings.sent5: The chut of the gun made the birds scatter in the sky.

meanings.definition: A word used to express annoyance or impatience.
meanings.sent1: Oh chut, I forgot my umbrella on a rainy day.
meanings.sent2: Chut, I burned the toast again!
meanings.sent3: Chut, I missed the bus by just a second.
meanings.sent4: She muttered a quiet chut under her breath when she dropped her phone.
meanings.sent5: The child's constant chut made his mother smile despite the annoyance.
